Reviews.Title: WOW
Reviews.Author: DreamShadows
Reviews.Content: This Phone is AWESOME!!! Even though i bought it months after it was discontinuedIts a Blackberry AND its a FLIP style!! And the best thing about this purchase was that I didnt get ripped off by a slimy merchant selling me a refurbished productIt was Totally New!! with all the accessories Just as advertised!! IN THE BOX!!!!Though there was 1 merchant who was selling the same phone... but I chose not to purchase from them because they were extremely New to amazon and had no positve reviews Thank god i didnt!!! I would have gotten burned!! They had no rep and It felt like a snow job ad!! I dodged a bullet and still got a great phoneThe dealer i purchased from is frm the Bronx and If i remember correctly from Commonwealth Ave.they sell through amazon.com and v. reputable as far as I'm concerned!!!

Reviews.Title: love it!!!!
Reviews.Author: shonte
Reviews.Content: I must say I was scared to buy the phone but when I got oh wait let me tell you it came in 4 Days and I turned it on though boost mobile and its great I would recommend rhe phone to anyone:)

Reviews.Title: Ordered the wrong phone, but gave it to my daughter in law!
Reviews.Author: D. Lang
Reviews.Content: luckily i didn't have to sell it back to Amazon. My daughter in law needed a new phone and so I gave her everything I ordered and she's now signed up w/ Boost Mobile Service. I never heard of them. But that phone is awesome!

Reviews.Title: i love it alot
Reviews.Author: janice obanion
Reviews.Content: i love this phone alot and so much its my best phone i ever had i love it so much its easy for me to dial numbers on it i love this smart phone  im glad you had it in  stock for me its very pretty phone i like all the apps on it  to
